name: Movie Femme Fatales Quiz | Movie Stars Mixed | 10 Questions

questions.text: This actress starred in a highly publicized Howard Hughes movie (which also starred Jack Beutel)
questions.explanation:
Jane Russell.

	The film was 'The Outlaw'. It was considered quite racy in its day.

questions.text: This actress stabbed a man to death - or did her daughter do it?
questions.explanation:
Lana Turner.

	A big murder trial at the time

questions.text: This actress starred in movies based on works by Edward Albee, John O'Hara and Theodore Dreiser
questions.explanation:
Elizabeth Taylor.

	Albee was 'Virginia Woolf', O'Hara was 'Butterfield 8', Dreiser was 'Place in the Sun'.

questions.text: This actress starred in the movie 'Two Women'
This actress initially worked under her real name, Cansino
questions.explanation:
Rita Hayworth.

	I guess Hayworth sounded better?

questions.text: This actress apparently died in a drowning accident.
questions.explanation:
Carol Wayne.

	There are mysterious circumstances, however. Darnell perished heroically in a fire. Stevens died of a drug overdose - accidental or intentional?

questions.text: This actress shared an ex-husband with Jane Fonda.
questions.explanation:
Brigitte Bardot.

	The husband was the late Roger Vadim. Derek shared a husband with Linda Evans: John Derek.

questions.text: This actress was once married to TV personality Richard Dawson
questions.explanation:
Diana Dors.

	It lasted for a while

questions.text: This actress starred in a movie that was based on a work by Mark Twain (and also starred Bing Crosby)
questions.explanation:
Rhonda Fleming.

	'A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court'

questions.text: This actress was once married to Mickey Rooney
